Title: Mowgli. Kidnapping
Actors: Mariya Vinogradova, Vladimir Ushakov, Sergey Martinson, Lyudmila Kasatkina
Plot: Since Maugli saved from the trap of baby elephant from family of elephant Hatkhi, a rumor that a human baby lives in a wolfish covey, reached to banderlogists. An apish tribe arboricolous ...
